title: The Missing Lunch Thief
setting: Brightside Marketing, break room, Monday noon
premise: Someone ate Karen's clearly-labeled leftover lasagna from the office fridge between 11:30 AM and 12:15 PM.

suspects.name: Tom Blake
suspects.motive: Always complains about the cafeteria food
suspects.alibi: I was on a client call at my desk from 11:00 to 12:30. My colleague Derek sat across from me the whole time and can confirm.

suspects.name: Priya Sharma
suspects.motive: Forgot her lunch at home today
suspects.alibi: I was in the second-floor design lab working on mockups. I had my headphones on and didn't leave until 12:30 when the lunch alarm went off.

suspects.name: Greg Hollister
suspects.motive: Has been seen eyeing Karen's food before
suspects.alibi: I was fixing a printer jam in Conference Room B from 11:15 to 12:00. Then I went straight to the lobby to meet a vendor.

suspects.name: Nina Reeves
suspects.motive: Was on a strict diet and craving comfort food
suspects.alibi: I spent the whole morning in the supply closet doing inventory. I didn't step out until 12:20 when I went directly to my desk.

clues.title: Receptionist's Observation
clues.content: The receptionist says no outside vendors visited the office today. All scheduled vendor meetings were cancelled yesterday.

clues.title: Security Badge Log
clues.content: Badge swipe records show only Greg and Nina accessed the break room floor between 11:30 and 12:15.

clues.title: Tomato Sauce Evidence
clues.content: A fresh tomato sauce stain was found on the supply closet door handle. Nina claims she never left the supply closet during that time.

hints.text: Pay close attention to where each suspect claims to have gone after leaving their main location.
Did anyone mention meeting someone who might not have actually been there that day?
